doc.title: Typo in "The End of Char Kway Teow"
doc.text: It/PRP has/VBZ been/VBN brought/VBN to/TO my/PRP$ attention/NN that/IN there/RB has/VB been/VBN a/DT cardinal/JJ typo/NN in/IN my/PRP$ book/NN ./. Cardinal/JJ because/IN it/PRP involves/VBZ the/DT surname/NN of/IN one/CD of/IN my/PRP$ sponsors/NN ./. The/DT mistake/NN is/VBZ found/JJ on/IN Pg/DT 32/CD ,/, on/IN the/DT second/NN line/NN of/IN the/DT last/JJ paragraph/NN ./. The/DT tea/NN merchant/NN mentioned/VBD in/IN the/DT book/NN was/VBD supposed/JJ to/TO be/VB Kenry/JJ PEH/NN instead/RB of/IN Kenry/NN POH/NN ./. It/PRP seems/VBZ that/IN spellcheck/NN changed/NN Peh/NN to/TO Poh/NNP and/CC I/PRP overlooked/VB it/PRP during/IN the/DT proofreading/NN stage/NN ./. Since/IN I/PRP was/VBD the/DT only/RB one/CD who/WP could/MD have/VB picked/VBN up/IN the/DT error/NN ,/, I/PRP am/VBP entirely/RB responsible/JJ for/IN the/DT mistake/NN ./. The/DT mistake/NN has/VBZ been/VBN rectified/JJ and/CC the/DT correct/NN version/NN will/MD appear/VB in/IN future/NN reprints/NN of/IN the/DT book/NN ./. My/PRP$ sincere/JJ apologies/NN to/TO Mr/NNP Kenry/NNP Peh/NN of/IN Pek/NNP Sin/NNP Choon/NNP Tea/NNP Merchants/NN for/IN the/DT oversight/NN ./.
